cause.description:
The NRA foundation, Inc helps promote legislature that will help us law-abiding citizens keep our firearms. They defend the Second Amendment's clear-cut message: American citizens have the right to bear arms. They also have numerous firearm safety courses and programs, instructor certifications, self-defense courses, etc.
Support your constitutional right to own a gun. Whether it be for sport or survival, refuse to be a victim by being inactive.
1. We have a constitutional right to bear arms that cannot be denied
2. Taking away guns from good citizens can easily make them victims
cause.mission: Keep the Second Amendment alive and help promote gun safety
cause.name: Defend the Second Amendment
